channel.title: Projects on CopeNLU
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on CopeNLU

item.title: Knowledge Base Population
item.description: Extract information about entities, phrases and relations between them from text to populate knowledge bases

item.title: Learning with Limited Labelled Data
item.description: Learning with limited labelled data, including multi-task learning, weakly supervised and zero-shot learning

item.title: Multilingual Learning
item.description: Training models to work well for multiple languages, including low-resource ones

item.title: Question Answering
item.description: Answer questions automatically, including in conversational settings

item.title: Stance Detection and Fact Checking
item.description: Determine the attitude expressed in a text towards a topic, and use this for automatic evidence-based fact checking
